00040 void SendTCPRequest (SockRequestResponse * s, int sock) {
00041     MinetSend(tcp, *s);
00042 
00043     if (s->type != STATUS) {
00044         RequestRecord * elt = new RequestRecord(s, sock);
00045         tcpq.Insert((void *)elt);
00046     } else {
00047         delete s;
00048     }
00049 }

00051 static void SendAppMessage(SockRequestResponse * s, int sock) {
00052     SockLibRequestResponse * appmsg  = NULL;
00053 
00054     appmsg = new SockLibRequestResponse(mSTATUS, s->connection, sock, 
00055                                         s->data, s->bytes, s->error);
00056     MinetSend(app, *appmsg);
00057 
00058     delete appmsg;
00059 }

00062 static void HandleTCPWrite(SockRequestResponse * s, int & respond) {
00063 
00064     Connection * c = NULL;
00065     int sock;
00066     int newsock;
00067 
00068 
00069     
00070     sock = socks.FindConnection(s->connection);
00071     
00072     if (sock <= 0) {
00073         s->bytes = 0;
00074         s->error = ENOMATCH;
00075         return;
00076     }
00077     
00078     switch (socks.GetStatus(sock)) {
00079         case CONNECTED:
00080             s->bytes = MIN(s->data.GetSize(),
00081                            (BIN_SIZE - socks.GetBin(sock)->GetSize()));
00082 
00083             if (s->bytes > 0) {
00084                 socks.GetBin(sock)->AddBack(s->data.ExtractFront(s->bytes));
00085                 s->error = EOK;
00086             } else {
00087                 s->error = EBUF_SPACE;
00088             }
00089 
00090             s->data = Buffer();
00091 
00092             break;
00093         case READ_PENDING: 
00094             // This assumes that the App can read all the data
00095             //    we are sending!
00096             if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00097                 SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00098             }
00099 
00100             socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00101 
00102             s->error = EOK;
00103             s->bytes = s->data.GetSize();
00104             s->data  = Buffer();
00105 
00106             break;
00107         case ACCEPT_PENDING:   
00108             // must remember to deal with port assignment
00109 
00110             socks.SetStatus(sock, LISTENING);
00111 
00112             if (s->error != EOK) {
00113                 
00114                 if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00115                     SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 s->error = EOK;
00119 
00120                 break;
00121             }
00122             
00123             // Need to fix it so that when we close a socket the port is not made
00124             // available if another socket is still attached to it.  Also do error
00125             // checking to make sure that local connection didn't get muddled.
00126             
00127             newsock = socks.FindFreeSock();
00128 
00129             if (newsock > 0) {
00130                 c = socks.GetConnection(newsock);
00131 
00132                 c->src      = s->connection.src;
00133                 c->dest     = s->connection.dest;
00134                 c->srcport  = s->connection.srcport;
00135                 c->destport = s->connection.destport;
00136                 c->protocol = s->connection.protocol;
00137 
00138                 socks.SetStatus(newsock, CONNECTED);
00139 
00140                 if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00141                     socks.SetFifoToApp(newsock, app);
00142                     socks.SetFifoFromApp(sock, app);
00143 
00144                     SendAppMessage(s, newsock);
00145                     
00146                     break;
00147                 }
00148             }
00149 
00150             s->error = ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL;
00151 
00152             break;
00153 
00154         case CONNECT_PENDING:
00155 
00156             if (s->error != EOK) {
00157 
00158                 if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00159                     SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 s->error = EOK;
00163                 socks.CloseSocket(sock);
00164 
00165                 break;
00166             }
00167 
00168             c = socks.GetConnection(sock);
00169 
00170             c->src      = s->connection.src;
00171             c->dest     = s->connection.dest;
00172             c->srcport  = s->connection.srcport;
00173             c->destport = s->connection.destport;
00174 
00175             socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00176 
00177             if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00178                 SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00179             }
00180             
00181             break;
00182 
00183         default:
00184             respond  = 1;
00185             s->type  = STATUS;
00186             s->error = EINVALID_OP;
00187             break;
00188     }
00189 
00190     return;
00191 }

00194 void HandleTCPStatus(SockRequestResponse * s, int & respond) {
00195     RequestRecord          * elt     = NULL;
00196     SockRequestResponse    * request = NULL;
00197     int sock;
00198 
00199 
00200     elt = (RequestRecord *)tcpq.Remove();
00201     request = elt->srr;
00202     sock = elt->sock;
00203 
00204     switch (request->type) {
00205         case CONNECT:
00206 
00207             if (s->error != EOK) {
00208 
00209                 if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00210                     SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 socks.CloseSocket(sock);
00214             }
00215 
00216             break;
00217 
00218         case ACCEPT:
00219 
00220             if (s->error != EOK) {
00221 
00222                 if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00223                     SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 socks.SetStatus(sock, LISTENING);
00227             }
00228 
00229             break;
00230 
00231         case WRITE:
00232             if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00233                 SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00234             }
00235 
00236             socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00237 
00238             break;
00239 
00240         default:
00241             break;
00242     }
00243 
00244     delete elt;
00245 
00246     return;    
00247 }

00250 void ProcessTCPMessage(SockRequestResponse * s, int & respond) {
00251 
00252     if (s->type == WRITE) {
00253 
00254         respond = 1;
00255         s->type = STATUS;
00256         HandleTCPWrite(s, respond);
00257 
00258     } else if (s->type == STATUS) {
00259 
00260         respond = 0;
00261         HandleTCPStatus(s, respond);
00262 
00263     } else {
00264         respond = 1;
00265         s->type = STATUS;
00266         s->error = EINVALID_OP;
00267     }
00268 
00269     return;
00270 }

00298         case CONNECTED:
00299             s->bytes = MIN(s->data.GetSize(),
00300                            (BIN_SIZE - socks.GetBin(sock)->GetSize()));

00303                 socks.GetBin(sock)->AddBack(s->data.ExtractFront(s->bytes));
00304                 s->error = EOK;
00305             } else {
00306                 s->error = EBUF_SPACE;

00308

00310 
00311             break;
00312

00314             // This assumes that the App can read all the data

00339 static void HandleUDPStatus(SockRequestResponse * s, int & respond) {
00340     RequestRecord * elt = NULL;
00341     SockRequestResponse * request = NULL;
00342     int sock;
00343 
00344     elt = (RequestRecord *) udpq.Remove();
00345 
00346     request = elt->srr;
00347     sock = elt->sock;
00348 
00349     switch (request->type) {
00350         case FORWARD:
00351 
00352             if (app != MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00353                 SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00354             }
00355 
00356             if (s->error != EOK) {
00357                 socks.CloseSocket(sock);
00358             } else if ( (socks.GetConnection(sock)->dest != IP_ADDRESS_ANY) &&
00359                         (socks.GetConnection(sock)->destport != PORT_ANY) ) {
00360                 socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00361             } else {
00362                 socks.SetStatus(sock, BOUND);
00363             }
00364 
00365             break;
00366 
00367         case WRITE:
00368         
00369             if (app!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00370                 SendAppMessage(s, sock);
00371             }
00372 
00373             if ( (socks.GetConnection(sock)->dest != IP_ADDRESS_ANY) &&
00374                  (socks.GetConnection(sock)->destport != PORT_ANY)) {
00375 
00376                 socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00377             } else {
00378                 socks.SetStatus(sock, BOUND);
00379             }
00380 
00381             break;
00382         default: 
00383             break;
00384     }
00385 
00386     delete elt;
00387 
00388     return;
00389 }

00414 void SendICMPRequest (SockRequestResponse *s, int sock) {
00415   MinetSend(icmp,*s);
00416   if (s->type != STATUS) {
00417     RequestRecord * elt = new RequestRecord(s, sock);
00418     icmpq.Insert((void *) elt);

00420   else
00421     delete s;

00424 void ProcessICMPMessage (SockRequestResponse * s, int & respond) {
00425   srrType type = s->type;
00426   RequestRecord *elt = NULL;
00427   SockRequestResponse * request = NULL;
00428   SockLibRequestResponse *appmsg = NULL;
00429   int sock;
00430 
00431   // process the message
00432   Packet p(s->data);
00433   p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<IPHeader>(IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(p));
00434   p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<ICMPHeader>(ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH);
00435   IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00436   ICMPHeader icmph = p.FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00437   Buffer &payload = p.GetPayload();
00438   unsigned char icmp_type;  unsigned char icmp_code;
00439   icmph.GetType(icmp_type);  icmph.GetCode(icmp_code);
00440   IPAddress address_mask;
00441 
00442   switch (type) {
00443   case WRITE:
00444 
00445     // sending up to application layer currently is currently not implemented
00446     // respond to ICMP packet
00447 
00448     //
00449     // Basically, all icmp packets are sent up to sock by icmp_module
00450     // sock_module just prints and then responds with a status ok.
00451     //
00452     // the data is just dropped on the floor.
00453     //
00454     // What this should do is find connections that match the error
00455     // returns and then return errors to the application
00456     // FIX -PAD
00457     switch(unsigned (icmp_type)) {
00458     case ECHO_REPLY:
00459       cerr << "[ECHO REPLY]" << endl;
00460       break;
00461     case TIMESTAMP_REPLY:
00462       cerr << "[TIMESTAMP REPLY]" << endl;
00463       unsigned long originate, receive, transmit, current_time;
00464 
00465       icmph.GetOriginateTimestamp(payload, originate);
00466       icmph.GetReceiveTimestamp(payload, receive);
00467       icmph.GetTransmitTimestamp(payload, transmit);
00468       icmph.GetCurrentTimeInMilliseconds(current_time);
00469 
00470       cerr << "orig = " << originate << ", recv = " << receive << ", xmit = " << transmit << endl;
00471       cerr << "rtt = " << current_time-originate << ", difference = " << transmit-originate << endl;
00472       break;
00473     case ADDRESSMASK_REPLY:
00474       cerr << "[ADDRESS MASK REPLY]" << endl;
00475       icmph.GetAddressMask(payload, address_mask);
00476       cerr << "received address mask: " << address_mask << endl;
00477       break;
00478     case DESTINATION_UNREACHABLE:
00479       switch(unsigned(icmp_code)) {
00480       case NETWORK_UNREACHABLE:
00481         cerr << "[DESTINATION UNREACHABLE]" << endl;
00482         cerr << "NETWORK IS UNREACHABLE" << endl;
00483         break;
00484       case HOST_UNREACHABLE:
00485         cerr << "[DESTINATION UNREACHABLE]" << endl;
00486         cerr << "HOST IS UNREACHABLE" << endl;
00487         break;
00488       case PROTOCOL_UNREACHABLE:
00489         cerr << "[DESTINATION UNREACHABLE]" << endl;
00490         cerr << "PROTOCOL IS UNREACHABLE" << endl;
00491         break;
00492       case PORT_UNREACHABLE:
00493         cerr << "[DESTINATION UNREACHABLE]" << endl;
00494         cerr << "PORT IS UNREACHABLE" << endl;
00495         break;
00496       case FRAGMENTATION_NEEDED:
00497         cerr << "[DESTINATION UNREACHABLE]" << endl;
00498         cerr << "FRAGMENTATION NEEDED" << endl;
00499         break;
00500       case SOURCE_ROUTE_FAILED:
00501         cerr << "[DESTINATION UNREACHABLE]" << endl;
00502         cerr << "SOURCE ROUTE FAILED" << endl;
00503         break;
00504       }
00505       break;
00506     case REDIRECT:
00507       switch(unsigned(icmp_code)) {
00508       case REDIRECT_FOR_NETWORK:
00509         cerr << "[REDIRECT]" << endl;
00510         cerr << "REDIRECT FOR NETWORK" << endl;
00511         break;
00512       case REDIRECT_FOR_HOST:
00513         cerr << "[REDIRECT]" << endl;
00514         cerr << "REDIRECT FOR HOST" << endl;
00515         break;
00516       case REDIRECT_FOR_TOS_NETWORK:
00517         cerr << "[REDIRECT]" << endl;
00518         cerr << "REDIRECT FOR TYPE OF SERVICE NETWORK" << endl;
00519         break;
00520       case REDIRECT_FOR_TOS_HOST:
00521         cerr << "[REDIRECT]" << endl;
00522         cerr << "REDIRECT FOR TYPE OF SERVICE HOST" << endl;
00523         break;
00524       }
00525       break;
00526     case SOURCE_QUENCH:
00527       cerr << "[SOURCE QUENCH]" << endl;
00528       break;
00529     case TIME_EXCEEDED:
00530       switch(unsigned(icmp_code)) {
00531       case TTL_EQUALS_ZERO_DURING_TRANSIT:
00532         cerr << "[TIME EXCEEDED]" << endl;
00533         cerr << "TIME TO LIVE EQUALS ZERO DURING TRANSIT" << endl;
00534         break;
00535       case TTL_EQUALS_ZERO_DURING_REASSEMBLY:
00536         cerr << "[TIME EXCEEDED]" << endl;
00537         cerr << "TIME TO LIVE EQUALS ZERO DURING REASSEMBLY" << endl;
00538         break;
00539       }
00540       break;
00541     case PARAMETER_PROBLEM:
00542       switch(unsigned(icmp_code)) {
00543       case IP_HEADER_BAD:
00544         cerr << "[PARAMETER PROBLEM]" << endl;
00545         cerr << "IP HEADER BAD" << endl;
00546         break;
00547       case REQUIRED_OPTION_MISSING:
00548         cerr << "[PARAMETER PROBLEM]" << endl;
00549         cerr << "REQUIRED OPTION MISSING" << endl;
00550         break;
00551       }
00552       break;
00553     }
00554 
00555     respond = 1;
00556     s->type = STATUS;
00557     sock = socks.FindConnection(s->connection);
00558     if (sock <= 0) {
00559       s->bytes = 0;
00560       s->error = ENOMATCH;
00561       break;
00562     }
00563     switch (socks.GetStatus(sock)) {
00564     case CONNECTED:
00565       s->bytes = MIN(s->data.GetSize(),
00566                      (BIN_SIZE - socks.GetBin(sock)->GetSize()));
00567       if (s->bytes > 0) {
00568         socks.GetBin(sock)->AddBack(s->data.ExtractFront(s->bytes));
00569         s->error = EOK;
00570       }
00571       else {
00572         s->error = EBUF_SPACE;
00573       }
00574       s->data = Buffer();
00575       break;
00576     case READ_PENDING:     // This assumes that the App can read all the data
00577                            //    we are sending!
00578       if (app!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00579         appmsg = new SockLibRequestResponse(mSTATUS,
00580                                             s->connection,
00581                                             sock,
00582                                             s->data,
00583                                             s->bytes,
00584                                             s->error);
00585         MinetSend(app,*appmsg);
00586         delete appmsg;
00587       }
00588       socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00589       s->error = EOK;
00590       s->bytes = s->data.GetSize();
00591       s->data = Buffer();
00592       break;
00593     default:
00594       respond = 1;
00595       s->type = STATUS;
00596       s->error = EINVALID_OP;
00597       break;
00598     }
00599     break;
00600 
00601   case STATUS:
00602     respond = 0;
00603     elt = (RequestRecord *) icmpq.Remove();
00604     request = elt->srr;
00605     sock = elt->sock;
00606     switch (request->type) {
00607     case FORWARD:
00608       if (app!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00609         appmsg = new SockLibRequestResponse(mSTATUS,
00610                                             s->connection,
00611                                             sock,
00612                                             s->data,
00613                                             s->bytes,
00614                                             s->error);
00615         MinetSend(app,*appmsg);
00616         delete appmsg;
00617       }
00618       if (s->error != EOK) {
00619         socks.CloseSocket(sock);
00620       }
00621       else {
00622         if ((socks.GetConnection(sock)->dest != IP_ADDRESS_ANY) &&
00623             (socks.GetConnection(sock)->destport != PORT_ANY)) {
00624           socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00625         }
00626         else {
00627           socks.SetStatus(sock, BOUND);
00628         }
00629       }
00630       break;
00631     case WRITE:
00632       if (app!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00633         appmsg = new SockLibRequestResponse(mSTATUS,
00634                                             s->connection,
00635                                             sock,
00636                                             s->data,
00637                                             s->bytes,
00638                                             s->error);
00639         MinetSend(app,*appmsg);
00640         delete appmsg;
00641       }
00642       if ((socks.GetConnection(sock)->dest != IP_ADDRESS_ANY) &&
00643           (socks.GetConnection(sock)->destport != PORT_ANY)) {
00644         socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00645       }
00646       else {
00647         socks.SetStatus(sock, BOUND);
00648       }
00649       break;
00650     }
00651     delete elt;
00652     break;
00653 
00654   default:
00655     respond = 1;
00656     s->type = STATUS;
00657     s->error = EINVALID_OP;
00658     break;
00659   }
00660 }
00661 
00662 
00663 
00664 int ResolveSrcPort (int sock, const Connection & c) {
00665   // If the source port in c is unbound, we try to find and reserve a port.
00666   // If it is bound, we check that it is available and reserve it.  In either
00667   // case, if we are successfull then we return the (newly reserved) port.  If
00668   // we fail, we return -1.
00669   int port = c.srcport;
00670   IPAddress ip = c.src;
00671   if (port == PORT_NONE) {
00672     port = ports.FindFreePort(ip, sock);
00673     if (port < 0)
00674       return -1;
00675   }
00676   else if (ports.Socket(ip, port) != 0)
00677     return -1;
00678   else
00679     ports.AssignPort(ip, port, sock);
00680   return port;
00681 }
00682 
00683 // request -> response (in place)
00684 // respond=1 if response should be sent to app
00685 void ProcessAppRequest(SockLibRequestResponse & s, int & respond)
00686 {
00687   int sock, port;
00688   unsigned char protocol;
00689   Status status;
00690   SockRequestResponse * srr;
00691   Connection *c;
00692 
00693   slrrType type = s.type;
00694 
00695   respond = 1;
00696   s.type=mSTATUS;
00697 
00698   switch (type) {
00699 
00700   case mSOCKET:
00701     sock = socks.FindFreeSock();
00702     if (sock >= 0) {
00703       socks.SetStatus(sock, UNBOUND);
00704       c = socks.GetConnection(sock);
00705       c->protocol = s.connection.protocol;
00706       socks.SetFifoToApp(sock, app);
00707       socks.SetFifoFromApp(sock, app);
00708       s.sockfd = sock;
00709       s.error = EOK;
00710     }
00711     else
00712       s.error = ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL;
00713     break;
00714 
00715   case mBIND:
00716     sock = s.sockfd;
00717     if ((socks.GetStatus(sock) != UNBOUND) ||
00718         (app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock))) {
00719       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00720       break;
00721     }
00722     port = ResolveSrcPort(sock, s.connection);
00723     if (port < 0) {
00724       s.error = ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL;
00725       break;
00726     }
00727     s.connection.srcport = port;
00728     if (s.connection.src == IP_ADDRESS_ANY) {
00729       s.connection.src = MyIPAddr;
00730     }
00731     c = socks.GetConnection(sock);
00732     c->src = s.connection.src;
00733     c->srcport = s.connection.srcport;
00734     protocol = c->protocol;
00735     if (protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP) {
00736       if (udp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00737         respond = 0;
00738         srr = new SockRequestResponse(FORWARD,
00739                                       *c,
00740                                       s.data,
00741                                       s.bytes,
00742                                       s.error);
00743         SendUDPRequest (srr, sock);
00744         break;
00745       } else {
00746         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00747         break;
00748       }
00749     }
00750     socks.SetStatus(sock, BOUND);
00751     s.error = EOK;
00752     break;
00753 
00754   case mLISTEN:
00755     sock = s.sockfd;
00756     if ((socks.GetStatus(sock) != BOUND) ||
00757         (app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock))) {
00758       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00759       break;
00760     }
00761     protocol = socks.GetConnection(sock)->protocol;
00762     if (protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP) {
00763       s.sockfd = 0;
00764       s.error = ENOT_SUPPORTED;
00765       break;
00766     }
00767     c = socks.GetConnection(sock);
00768     c->dest = IP_ADDRESS_ANY;
00769     c->destport = PORT_ANY;
00770     socks.SetStatus(sock, LISTENING);
00771     s.error = EOK;
00772     break;
00773 
00774   case mACCEPT:
00775     sock = s.sockfd;
00776     if ((socks.GetStatus(sock) != LISTENING) ||
00777         (app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock))) {
00778       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00779       break;
00780     }
00781     protocol = socks.GetConnection(sock)->protocol;
00782     if (protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP) {
00783       s.sockfd = 0;
00784       s.error = ENOT_SUPPORTED;
00785       break;
00786     }
00787     if (tcp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00788       respond = 0;
00789       srr = new SockRequestResponse(ACCEPT,
00790                                     *socks.GetConnection(sock),
00791                                     s.data,
00792                                     s.bytes,
00793                                     s.error);
00794       SendTCPRequest (srr, sock);
00795       socks.SetStatus(sock, ACCEPT_PENDING);
00796       break;
00797     } else {
00798       s.sockfd = 0;
00799       s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00800       break;
00801     }
00802 
00803   case mCONNECT:
00804     sock = s.sockfd;
00805     status = socks.GetStatus(sock);
00806     if ((app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock)) ||
00807         ((status != UNBOUND) && (status != BOUND))) {
00808       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00809       break;
00810     }
00811     c = socks.GetConnection(sock);
00812     protocol = c->protocol;
00813     if (protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP) {
00814       if (udp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00815         respond = 0;
00816         if (status == UNBOUND) {
00817           port =  ResolveSrcPort(sock, s.connection);
00818           if (port < 0) {
00819             respond = 1;
00820             s.error = ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL;
00821             break;
00822           }
00823           c->srcport = port;
00824           if (s.connection.src == IP_ADDRESS_ANY) {
00825             c->src = MyIPAddr;
00826           } else {
00827             c->src = s.connection.src;
00828           }
00829         }
00830         c->dest = s.connection.dest;
00831         c->destport = s.connection.destport;
00832         srr = new SockRequestResponse(FORWARD,
00833                                       *c,
00834                                       s.data,
00835                                       s.bytes,
00836                                       s.error);
00837         SendUDPRequest (srr, sock);
00838         socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECTED);
00839         break;
00840       } else {
00841         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00842         break;
00843       }
00844     } else {
00845       if (tcp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00846         respond = 0;
00847         if (status == UNBOUND) {
00848           port =  ResolveSrcPort(sock, s.connection);
00849           if (port < 0) {
00850             respond = 1;
00851             s.error = ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL;
00852             break;
00853           }
00854           c->srcport = port;
00855           if (s.connection.src == IP_ADDRESS_ANY) {
00856             c->src = MyIPAddr;
00857           } else {
00858             c->src = s.connection.src;
00859           }
00860         }
00861         c->dest = s.connection.dest;
00862         c->destport = s.connection.destport;
00863         srr = new SockRequestResponse(CONNECT,
00864                                       *c,
00865                                       s.data,
00866                                       s.bytes,
00867                                       s.error);
00868         SendTCPRequest (srr, sock);
00869         socks.SetStatus(sock, CONNECT_PENDING);
00870         break;
00871       } else {
00872         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00873         break;
00874       }
00875     }
00876 
00877   case mREAD:
00878     sock = s.sockfd;
00879     if (((socks.GetStatus(sock) != CONNECTED) &&
00880          (! ((socks.GetStatus(sock) == BOUND) &&
00881              (socks.GetConnection(sock)->protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP)))) ||
00882         (app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock))) {
00883       s.data.Clear();
00884       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00885       break;
00886     }
00887     if (socks.GetBin(sock)->GetSize() > 0) {
00888       s.data = *socks.GetBin(sock);
00889       s.error = EOK;
00890       break;
00891     }
00892     if (! (socks.GetBlockingStatus(sock))) {
00893       s.data.Clear();
00894       s.error = EWOULD_BLOCK;
00895       break;
00896     }
00897     respond = 0;
00898     socks.SetStatus(sock, READ_PENDING);
00899     break;
00900 
00901   case mWRITE:
00902 
00903     sock = s.sockfd;
00904 
00905     if ((socks.GetStatus(sock) != CONNECTED) ||
00906         (app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock))) {
00907       s.bytes = 0;
00908       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00909       break;
00910     }
00911     protocol = socks.GetConnection(sock)->protocol;
00912     if (protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP) {
00913       if (udp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00914         respond = 0;
00915         srr = new SockRequestResponse(WRITE,
00916                                       *socks.GetConnection(sock),
00917                                       s.data,
00918                                       s.bytes,
00919                                       s.error);
00920         SendUDPRequest (srr, sock);
00921         socks.SetStatus(sock, WRITE_PENDING);
00922         break;
00923       } else {
00924         s.bytes = 0;
00925         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00926         break;
00927       }
00928     } else {
00929       if (tcp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00930         respond = 0;
00931         srr = new SockRequestResponse(WRITE,
00932                                       *socks.GetConnection(sock),
00933                                       s.data,
00934                                       s.bytes,
00935                                       s.error);
00936         SendTCPRequest (srr, sock);
00937         socks.SetStatus(sock, WRITE_PENDING);
00938         break;
00939       } else {
00940         s.bytes = 0;
00941         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00942         break;
00943       }
00944     }
00945   case mCLOSE:
00946     sock = s.sockfd;
00947     if (app != socks.GetFifoToApp(sock)) {
00948       s.error = EINVALID_OP;
00949       break;
00950     }
00951     protocol = socks.GetConnection(sock)->protocol;
00952     if (protocol == IP_PROTO_UDP) {
00953       if (udp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00954         srr = new SockRequestResponse(CLOSE,
00955                                       *socks.GetConnection(sock),
00956                                       s.data,
00957                                       s.bytes,
00958                                       s.error);
00959         SendUDPRequest (srr, sock);
00960         s.error = EOK;
00961       } else {
00962         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00963       }
00964     } else {
00965       if (tcp!=MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00966         srr = new SockRequestResponse(CLOSE,
00967                                       *socks.GetConnection(sock),
00968                                       s.data,
00969                                       s.bytes,
00970                                       s.error);
00971         SendTCPRequest (srr, sock);
00972         s.error = EOK;
00973       } else {
00974         s.error = ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00975       }
00976     }
00977     socks.CloseSocket(sock);
00978     break;
00979 
00980   default:
00981     break;
00982   }
00983 }
00984 
00985 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00986 
00987   MinetInit(MINET_SOCK_MODULE);
00988 
00989   tcp=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_TCP_MODULE) ? MinetConnect(MINET_TCP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00990   udp=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_UDP_MODULE) ? MinetConnect(MINET_UDP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00991   icmp=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ICMP_MODULE) ? MinetConnect(MINET_ICMP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00992   ipother=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE) ? MinetConnect(MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00993   app=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_APP) ? MinetAccept(MINET_APP) : MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00994 
00995   if (tcp==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_TCP_MODULE)) {
00996     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to tcp module"));
00997     return -1;
00998   }
00999   if (udp==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_UDP_MODULE)) {
01000     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to udp module"));
01001     return -1;
01002   }
01003   if (icmp==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ICMP_MODULE)) {
01004     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to icmp module"));
01005     return -1;
01006   }
01007   if (ipother==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE)) {
01008     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ipother module"));
01009     return -1;
01010   }
01011   if (app==MINET_NOHANDLE && (MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_APP) || MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE))) {
01012     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to app or socklib module"));
01013     return -1;
01014   }
01015 
01016 
01017   cerr << "sock_module fully armed and operational\n";
01018 
01019   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("sock_module fully armed and operational"));
01020 
01021   MinetEvent event;
01022 
01023   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
01024 
01025     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
01026         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
01027       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
01028     } else {
01029       if (event.handle==tcp) {
01030         int respond;
01031         SockRequestResponse *s = new SockRequestResponse;
01032         MinetReceive(tcp,*s);
01033         ProcessTCPMessage(s, respond);
01034         if (respond)
01035           MinetSend(tcp,*s);
01036       }
01037       if (event.handle==udp) {
01038         int respond;
01039         SockRequestResponse *s = new SockRequestResponse;
01040         MinetReceive(udp,*s);
01041         ProcessUDPMessage(s, respond);
01042         if (respond)
01043           MinetSend(udp,*s);
01044       }
01045       if (event.handle==icmp) {
01046         int respond;
01047         SockRequestResponse *s = new SockRequestResponse;
01048         MinetReceive(icmp,*s);
01049         ProcessICMPMessage(s, respond);
01050         if (respond)
01051           MinetSend(icmp,*s);
01052         MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Ignoring request from icmp - unimplemented"));
01053       }
01054       if (event.handle==app) {
01055         int respond;
01056         SockLibRequestResponse s;
01057         MinetReceive(app,s);
01058         ProcessAppRequest(s, respond);
01059         if (respond)
01060           MinetSend(app,s);
01061       }
01062     }
01063   }
01064   return 0;
01065 }
